content: अनवस्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नास्ति अवस्था यत्र] Unsteady; °स्थो निष्करुणश्च <ls>Dk. 135</ls>; unsettled, not fixed; °स्थो वायुः <ls>Śi. 11. 28.</ls> --स्था [न. त.] {@--1@} Instability, unsettled condition, disorder, confusion. {@--2@} Loose or unsteady conduct, incontinence. {@--3@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) Absence of finality or conclusion, an endless series of statements or causes and effects, one of the faults of reasoning (उपपाद्योपपादकयोरविश्रांतिः); एवमप्यनवस्था स्याद्या मूलक्षतिकारिणी <ls>K. P. 2</ls>; एवं च °प्रसंगः <ls>Ś. B.</ls> {@--4@} Not being 10 days old (दशाहाभावः).
